name: @cap-cws/express
description: CWS Express - typescript express server for cap
author: Charles Ting

scripts.start: cross-env PORT=${npm_package_config_port} CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true CHOKIDAR_INTERVAL=1000 tsx watch src/server-index.ts
scripts.test: cross-env PORT=${npm_package_config_port} CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true CHOKIDAR_INTERVAL=1000 tsx watch src/test-index.ts
scripts.remove:node_modules: npx rimraf --glob **/node_modules **/build && npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf **/yarn.lock
